column4: Can anybody help me with a little dpkg problem,please? Since I tried to upgrade gstreamer08-gtk I cant use apt-get anymore/
does it say something about apt-get -f install ?
no it says something about dpkg --configure -a and then it just does nothing anymore
then run that :) "sudo dpkg --configure -a"
actually I am on on su -already
this is what the terminal says and freezes: Setting up gstreamer0.8-gtk (0.8.11-0ubuntu4) ...
try to remove it
how? I cannot use any apt-get or other commands
dpkg was interrupted, you must manually run 'dpkg --configure -a' to correct the problem. *sigh*
why did you install it?
why? I jsut did some smart upgrade.
so you run Breezy now?
running breezy
in that case you can't use hoary apps...
for a couple of weeks without *cough* problems
try dpkg --force-depends --purge gstreamer0.8-gtk
so you removed it but now with --configure it freezes?
I cant remove anything.....
can I remove the gstream08 somehow without doing the dpkg --configure before?
yes with dpkg --force-depends --purge packagename
dpkg --force-depends --purge gstreamer......freezes too
something's really f*cked up. maybe you should try a reboot and then removing it again
thank you....rebooting
